message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $9000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $7500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I still believe the product's value is higher. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8200. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $7000. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products and the fact that I'm willing to buy the product quickly.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $8000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $8100. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I believe it's still a fair price for this unique product.

This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
